metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11439 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: The TagLib::Ogg::FLAC::File::scan function in oggflacfile.cpp in TagLib 1.11.1 allows remote attackers to cause information disclosure (heap-based buffer over-read) via a crafted audio file.

criterions.comment: taglib package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.11.1+dfsg.1-0.3').
